GR14yamcatpu:0: kāntas te puruṣottamaḥ phaṇipatiḥ śayyāsanaṃ vāhanaṃ vedātmā vihageśvaro yavanikā māyā jaganmohinī
GR14yamcatpu:1: brahmādisuravrajaḥ sadayitas tvaddāsadāsīgaṇaḥ śrīr ity eva ca nāma te bhagavati ! brūmaḥ kathaṃ tvāṃ vayam || YCs_1 ||
GR14yamcatpu:2: yasyās te mahimānam ātmana iva tvadvallabho 'pi prabhur nālaṃ mātum
GR14yamcatpu:4: tām tvāṃ dāsa iti, prapanna iti ca stoṣyāmy ahaṃ nirbhayo lokaikeśvari lokanāthadayite dānte dayāṃ te vidan || YCs_2 ||
GR14yamcatpu:5: śreyo tvatkaruṇānirīkṣaṇasudhāsandhukṣaṇād rakṣyate naṣṭaṃ prāk tadalābhas tribhuvanaṃ saṃpraty anantodayam |
GR14yamcatpu:6: śreyo na hy aravindalocanamanaḥkāntāprasādād ṛte saṃsṛtyakṣaravaiṣṇavādhvasu nṛṇāṃ saṃbhāvyate karhicit || YCs_3 ||
GR14yamcatpu:7: śāntānantamahāvibhūti paraṃ yad brahma rūpaṃ harer mūrtaṃ brahma tato 'pi
GR14yamcatpu:9: yāny anyāni yathāsukhaṃ viharato rūpāṇi sarvāṇi tāny āhuḥ svair anurūparūpavibhavair gāḍhopagūḍhāni te || YCs_4 ||
